item.title: Vekllei Expeditionary Corps
item.description: ߷ Part of the Military series of articles Overview # The Expeditionary Corps is Vekllei’s tip of the spear in combat. It is experienced, well-equipped, and highly mobile. It is also completely professionalised on a volunteer basis, unlike the Home Army. Commonwealth Legion # The Commonwealth Legion is the regular expeditionary army of Vekllei. It consists mostly of special forces designed for overseas and asymmetric fighting, and generally consists of the most elite Commonwealth units.
item.content:encoded:
߷ Part of the Military series of articles

Overview #

The Expeditionary Corps is Vekllei’s tip of the spear in combat. It is experienced, well-equipped, and highly mobile. It is also completely professionalised on a volunteer basis, unlike the Home Army.

Commonwealth Legion #

The Commonwealth Legion is the regular expeditionary army of Vekllei. It consists mostly of special forces designed for overseas and asymmetric fighting, and generally consists of the most elite Commonwealth units. It is presently a volunteer army, though conscripts can be mobilised from the Home Army in times of war.

During peacetime and low-intensity expeditionary fighting, the Commonwealth Legion consists of 32 regiments numbering around 35,000 men. Each regiment contains sustainment support units, but large tactical groups are supported by materiel from the Home Army. Like all offensively-postured Vekllei units, Commonwealth Legion regiments are ungrouped until they are assembled into tactical brigades for combat.

Commando Regiments #

Commandos Regiments #

  • 🪖 1st “Vekllei” Commandos
  • 🪖 2nd “Oslola” Commandos
  • 🪖 3rd “Orgos” Commandos
  • 🪖 4th “Herized” Commandos
  • 🪖 5th “Commonwealth” Commandos

Airborne Commandos Regiments #

  • 🪂 6th “Dragon” Airborne Commandos
  • 🪂 7th “Vasne” Airborne Commandos

Marine Commandos Regiments #

  • ⚓️ 8th “Lola” Marine Commandos
  • ⚓️ 9th “Arision” Marine Commandos

Special Operations Regiments #

  • 🔱 10th “Corodia” Marine Commandos

Regional Special Forces Regiments #

  • 🪖 11th “Veletia” Arctic Regiment
  • 🪖 12th “Torto” North Atlantic Regiment
  • 🪖 13th “Hammer” Africa Regiment
  • 🪖 14th “Edisin” Equatorial Regiments
  • 🪖 15th “Capricorn” Equatorial Regiments
  • 🪖 16th “Ret” Equatorial Regiments
  • 🪖 17th “Kolkotia” Antarctic Regiment
  • 🪖 18th “Cosmos” Lunar Regiment

Guards #

  • ⚔️ 19th “Crown” Guards
  • ⚔️ 20th “Parliament” Guards
  • ⚔️ 21st “Ordianessa” Guards
  • ⚔️ 22nd “Askap” Guards

Armoured Regiments #

  • ⚡️ 23rd “Zombie” Armoured Regiment
  • ⚡️ 24th “Torto” North Atlantic Regiment
  • ⚡️ 25th “Torto” North Atlantic Regiment

Artillery #

  • 💥 26th “Ardian” Cannons Regiment
  • ⚔️ 27th “Torto” Cannons Regiment
  • ⚔️ 28th “Torto” Cannons Regiment
  • ⚔️ 29th “Torto” Cannons Regiment
  • ⚔️ 30th “Torto” Cannons Regiment
  • ⚔️ 31st “Torto” Cannons Regiment
  • ⚔️ 32nd “Torto” Cannons Regiment

Foreign Legion #

Foreign Rifles #

  • 🪖 1st Foreign Rifles
  • 🪖 2nd Foreign Rifles
  • 🪖 3rd Foreign Rifles
  • 🪖 4th Foreign Rifles

Foreign Armour #

  • ⚡️ 5th Foreign Armour
  • ⚡️ 6th Foreign Armour

Foreign Engineers #

  • ⚒️ 7th Foreign Sappers
  • ⚒️ 8th Foreign Engineers
